mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.device_id AS "deviceId", a.device_name AS "deviceName", a.device_model AS "deviceModel", a.device_type AS "deviceType", a.device_price AS "devicePrice", a.device_brand AS "deviceBrand", a.device_status AS "deviceStatus", a.devices_choose_flag AS "devicesChooseFlag", a.distr_serl_num AS "distrSerlNum", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", u1.login_name AS "createBy.loginName", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", u2.login_name AS "updateBy.loginName", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.id = a.update_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_devices( id, device_id, device_name, device_model, device_type, device_price, device_brand, device_status, devices_choose_flag, distr_serl_num, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{deviceId}, #{deviceName}, #{deviceModel}, #{deviceType}, #{devicePrice}, #{deviceBrand}, #{deviceStatus}, #{devicesChooseFlag}, #{distrSerlNum}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE t_devices SET device_id = #{deviceId}, device_name = #{deviceName}, device_model = #{deviceModel}, device_type = #{deviceType}, device_price = #{devicePrice}, device_brand = #{deviceBrand}, device_status = #{deviceStatus}, devices_choose_flag = #{devicesChooseFlag}, distr_serl_num = #{distrSerlNum}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
